original_text: In this paper, an implementation of a LBP (local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented. First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm. Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization. During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented. Last, the improved LBP is adopted for recognition. Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in pressIn this paper, an implementation of a LBP (local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented. First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm. Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization. During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented. Last, the improved LBP is adopted for recognition. Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in press
original_translation: En este documento se presenta una implementación de un sistema de reconocimiento facial rápido basado en LBP (patrón binario local) en la plataforma Symbian. Primero, se detecta la cara en la imagen tomada de la cámara utilizando el algoritmo AdaBoost. Segundo, se realiza el preprocesamiento de la cara, que incluye la ubicación de los ojos, normalización geométrica y normalización de la iluminación. Durante el preprocesamiento facial, se propone e implementa un método rápido de ubicación de ojos llamado ER (Búsqueda de Pupila). Por último, se adopta el LBP mejorado para el reconocimiento. Aunque la capacidad computacional de la plataforma Symbian es limitada, los resultados experimentales muestran un buen rendimiento en cuanto a la tasa y tiempo de reconocimiento.
original_sentences: In this paper, an implementation of a LBP (local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented.
First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm.
Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization.
During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented.
Last, the improved LBP is adopted for recognition.

Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in pressIn this paper, an implementation of a LBP (local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented.
First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm.
Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization.
During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented.
Last, the improved LBP is adopted for recognition.
Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in press

illumination normalization.translated_text:
En este documento se presenta una implementación de un sistema de reconocimiento facial rápido basado en LBP (patrón binario local) en la plataforma Symbian. Primero, se detecta la cara en la imagen tomada de la cámara utilizando el algoritmo AdaBoost. Segundo, se realiza el preprocesamiento de la cara, que incluye la ubicación de los ojos, normalización geométrica y
normalización de la iluminación
. Durante el preprocesamiento facial, se propone e implementa un método rápido de ubicación de ojos llamado ER (Búsqueda de Pupila). Por último, se adopta el LBP mejorado para el reconocimiento. Aunque la capacidad computacional de la plataforma Symbian es limitada, los resultados experimentales muestran un buen rendimiento en cuanto a la tasa y tiempo de reconocimiento.

original_annotated_sentences:
In this paper, an implementation of a
LBP
(local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented.
First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm.
Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization.
During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented.

Last, the improved
LBP
is adopted for recognition.

Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in pressIn this paper, an implementation of a
LBP
(local binary pattern) based fast face recognition system on symbian platform is presented.
First, face in picture taken from camera is detected using AdaBoost algorithm.
Second, the pre-processing of the face is done, including eye location, geometric normalization, illumination normalization.
During the face preprocessing, a rapid eye location method named ER (Eyeball Search) is proposed and implemented.

Last, the improved
LBP
is adopted for recognition.
Although the computational capability of the symbian platform is limited, the experimental results show good performance for recognition rate and time. in press

symbian platform.translated_text:
En este documento se presenta una implementación de un sistema de reconocimiento facial rápido basado en LBP (patrón binario local) en la
plataforma Symbian
. Primero, se detecta la cara en la imagen tomada de la cámara utilizando el algoritmo AdaBoost. Segundo, se realiza el preprocesamiento de la cara, que incluye la ubicación de los ojos, normalización geométrica y normalización de la iluminación. Durante el preprocesamiento facial, se propone e implementa un método rápido de ubicación de ojos llamado ER (Búsqueda de Pupila). Por último, se adopta el LBP mejorado para el reconocimiento. Aunque la capacidad computacional de la
plataforma Symbian
es limitada, los resultados experimentales muestran un buen rendimiento en cuanto a la tasa y tiempo de reconocimiento.
